function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close social interactions in the living rooms and open spaces increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among household members and visitors.","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of visitors and practicing social distancing in social spaces.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and UV-C disinfection devices.","People":"Household members and visitors.","Owner":"Homeowners and residents."},{"Description":"Lack of use of individual refrigeration equipment despite its availability increases the risk of discomfort and potential health issues in high temperatures.","Impact":"Potential heat-related illnesses and discomfort during warm weather.","Mitigation":"Educating residents on the benefits of using individual refrigeration equipment and providing guidelines for heat management.","Technologies":"Individual air conditioners, fans, and cooling systems.","People":"Residents of dwellings with individual refrigeration equipment.","Owner":"Homeowners and building management."}]}
